feature1.explanation: Both texts exhibit similar use of hyphens, parentheses, and parentheses.

feature2.explanation: There is consistency in lexical variation and word choice, as well as in the grammatical categories used.

feature3.explanation: The sentence structures are relatively similar in complexity and length.

feature4.explanation: Both texts exhibit a formal tone with a focus on conveying information.

feature5.explanation: No spelling or typographical errors were present in either text.

overall.explanation: Considering the consistent punctuation style, lexical and grammatical features, formal tone, and absence of spelling errors, the likelihood of the texts being written by the same author is moderate to high.
